types.html:
mal dans sa peau (plural mal dans leur peau)

  1. not comfortable in one's own skin, not comfortable with who one is, feeling ill at ease with oneself
    Synonym: mal dans ses bottes
    Antonyms: bien dans sa peau, bien dans ses baskets, bien dans ses pompes, bien dans ses bottes
    être mal dans sa peau ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
    se sentir mal dans sa peau ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
trans: not comfortable in one's own skin, not comfortable with who one is, feeling ill at ease with oneself
not comfortable in one's own skin, not comfortable with who one is, feeling ill at ease with oneself

title: mal dans sa peau
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /mal dɑ̃ sa po/
